title: Mediterranean Masterpiece in the Heart of Nice
description: Step into a world of elegance and luxury with this exceptional villa located five minutes from the Promenade des Anglais. Set on a 3,340 m² landscaped estate, this 1920 architectural gem spans approximately 350 m² across three levels and offers five en-suite bedrooms, a dedicated office, a chapel converted into a hammam, terraces with sea views, and a heated pool surrounded by lush Mediterranean gardens.

title: 12 Units Building Near Promenade des Anglais
description: Income-generating building ideally located near the Promenade des Anglais in a quiet cul-de-sac. The 277.5 m² property extends over two levels and contains 12 fully furnished units (eight studios and four one-bedroom apartments) all rented, each with air conditioning and double glazing. Gross annual income of €83,000 makes this a compelling investment.

title: 3 Bedroom Apartment with Panoramic View
description: Located in an exclusive gated residence in the hills of Nice, this garden-level apartment offers 102.10 m² of living space complemented by an 87.5 m² terrace and a private 172.30 m² landscaped garden. The layout includes a bright living room, separate fitted kitchen, master suite with shower room, two additional bedrooms and a second bathroom.

title: 4 Bedroom Contemporary Villa with Panoramic View
description: Contemporary villa under construction on the residential hills of Nice. Delivered in structural state, the project spans three levels and includes a 66.73 m² living room, adjoining kitchen, four bedrooms, office, laundry room, three bathrooms, and an internal elevator. A large 89 m² garage and panoramic views make it a unique opportunity to finish a tailor-made residence.

title: 2 Bedroom Apartment with Garden and Panoramic Views
description: Exceptional ground-floor apartment offering 118 m² of refined interiors and a private garden exceeding 200 m². Located in a prestigious residence with pool, the home features a luminous living room, dining area, contemporary kitchen, two bedrooms, and two bathrooms, all finished with high-end materials and sold fully furnished.

title: 4 Bedroom Spacious Apartment in the Heart of Nice
description: Colourful bourgeois-style apartment on Avenue Jean Médecin boasting over 163 m² of bright living space. Features include a generous living room, dining area, four spacious bedrooms, balcony, mansarde, and cellar. Ideally located near transportation, shops, and the sea, this apartment offers significant potential for a bespoke renovation.

title: Sea-View Villa with Pool in Prime Nice Location
description: Light-filled 217 m² villa spread across two levels with seamless indoor-outdoor living. An open-plan living area leads to a sunlit terrace and private pool, while four bedrooms include a master suite with dressing room and laundry area. Additional perks include full air conditioning, double glazing, exterior shutters, a spacious garage, and covered carport.

title: 3 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Nice Fabron
description: Magnificent 97.59 m² apartment in the hills of Nice offering sweeping views of the sea and mountains. Two terraces totaling 34 m², bright living space, independent kitchen, three bedrooms, bathroom, shower room, dressing room, and storage. Located in a high-end residence with pool, tennis, gym, private gardens, and on-site caretaker.

title: 2 Bedroom Apartment in Musicians District
description: Bright 59 m² apartment on the third floor of a well-maintained building in the Musicians District. Includes a living room with open kitchen, two bedrooms, bathroom with toilet, additional separate toilet, and hallway. Centrally located within walking distance to shops, tram, schools, and Avenue Jean Médecin.

title: Renovated 2 Bedroom Apartment in Nice
description: Beautifully renovated 64.53 m² apartment featuring a living room with fitted kitchen and central island, two bedrooms, shower room, and separate toilet. Sold furnished with additional cellar storage, double glazing, and air conditioning. Located close to shops, university, and public transport.

title: 1 Bedroom Apartment in the Heart of Old Nice
description: Charming 34 m² apartment in the heart of Old Nice featuring a bright living room with open kitchen, spacious bedroom, high ceilings, and double-glazed windows. Individual electric heating and tasteful finishes make it move-in ready, just steps from shops, restaurants, transport, and the Promenade des Anglais.
